svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - August 24 2024
August 24 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 24, 2024" date: "2024-08-24"
Eth News and Links
Eight years of Week in Ethereum News
All core devs
• All Core Devs - Consensus (ACDC) #140 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: Pectra-devnet-2 : client teams debugging issues including a
few bad blocks, currently not finalizing Pectra-devnet-3 : plan to launch next week EIP7251 max effective balance : correlation penalty
update, fixes overflow EIP7594 PeerDAS : EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL & EL : general support for including in Pectra Blob limits
per transaction discussion Fulu named as next consensus layer upgrade and Fusaka (Fulu + Osaka) for combined upgrade Probelab: Gossipsub
analysis
• Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: Pectra-devnet-2 : client teams debugging issues including a few bad blocks, currently not finalizing
Pectra-devnet-3 : plan to launch next week EIP7251 max effective balance : correlation penalty update, fixes overflow EIP7594 PeerDAS :
EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL & EL : general support for including in Pectra Blob limits per transaction discussion
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade:
• Pectra-devnet-2 : client teams debugging issues including a few bad blocks, currently not finalizing
Pectra-devnet-2 : client teams debugging issues including a few bad blocks, currently not finalizing
• Pectra-devnet-3 : plan to launch next week
Pectra-devnet-3 : plan to launch next week
• EIP7251 max effective balance : correlation penalty update, fixes overflow
EIP7251 max effective balance : correlation penalty update, fixes overflow
• EIP7594 PeerDAS : EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL & EL : general support for including in Pectra Blob limits per transaction
discussion
EIP7594 PeerDAS :
• EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL & EL : general support for including in Pectra
EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL & EL : general support for including in Pectra
• Blob limits per transaction discussion
Blob limits per transaction discussion
• Fulu named as next consensus layer upgrade and Fusaka (Fulu + Osaka) for combined upgrade
Fulu named as next consensus layer upgrade and Fusaka (Fulu + Osaka) for combined upgrade
• Probelab: Gossipsub analysis
Probelab: Gossipsub analysis
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
• Pectra testing call #1
Pectra testing call #1
• Consensus specs v1.5.0-alpha.5 : target for peerdas-devnet-2
Consensus specs v1.5.0-alpha.5 : target for peerdas-devnet-2
• PeerDAS breakout #6 : Peerdas-devnet-2: launch in the next week Peerdas-devnet-3: rebase to Pectra, launch in 2-3 weeks
PeerDAS breakout #6 :
• Peerdas-devnet-2: launch in the next week
Peerdas-devnet-2: launch in the next week
• Peerdas-devnet-3: rebase to Pectra, launch in 2-3 weeks
Peerdas-devnet-3: rebase to Pectra, launch in 2-3 weeks
• EOF Implementers call #56 : Frangio : ERC721/1155 need ISCONTRACT and upgradeable proxies could be bricked by EOF contracts not able to
DELEGATECALL a legacy contract
EOF Implementers call #56 :
• Frangio : ERC721/1155 need ISCONTRACT and upgradeable proxies could be bricked by EOF contracts not able to DELEGATECALL a legacy
contract
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 28.6% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 28.6% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority ( Lido reduced Geth usage by 20% in Q2 ) Consensus
layer: Prysm 36% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
• Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority ( Lido reduced Geth usage by 20% in Q2 )
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority ( Lido reduced Geth usage by 20% in Q2 )
• Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
• Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
• Toni Wahrstätter: Timing games economies of scale , 30% validator share can delay 0.8s longer than 5% share Reorgs analysis : trending
down, mostly occurring in slot following epoch transitions
Toni Wahrstätter:
• Timing games economies of scale , 30% validator share can delay 0.8s longer than 5% share
Timing games economies of scale , 30% validator share can delay 0.8s longer than 5% share
• Reorgs analysis : trending down, mostly occurring in slot following epoch transitions
Reorgs analysis : trending down, mostly occurring in slot following epoch transitions
• Xatu consensus layer p2p tables : libp2p gossipsub beacon attestation, beacon block & blob sidecar
Xatu consensus layer p2p tables : libp2p gossipsub beacon attestation, beacon block & blob sidecar
• Nethermind: execution layer client performance via engine_NewPayload response times
Nethermind: execution layer client performance via engine_NewPayload response times
• ePBS p2p market : allows small builders to participate in the market
ePBS p2p market : allows small builders to participate in the market
Client Releases
• Consensus layer: Prysm v5.1.0 : bug fixes, remote signer public key persistence and experimental support for multiple beacon nodes
Consensus layer:
• Prysm v5.1.0 : bug fixes, remote signer public key persistence and experimental support for multiple beacon nodes
• Execution layer: Besu v24.8.0 : stack handling update & RPC service improvements
Execution layer:
• Besu v24.8.0 : stack handling update & RPC service improvements
For Stakers
• Somer Esat’s staking guides updated to add Reth execution layer client
Layer 2
• Offchain Labs roadmap : Stylus, BoLD, censorship timeout, decentralized sequencer, fast withdrawals, chain clusters, multi client
support, adaptive pricing and zk hybrid proving
Offchain Labs roadmap : Stylus, BoLD, censorship timeout, decentralized sequencer, fast withdrawals, chain clusters, multi client support,
adaptive pricing and zk hybrid proving
• L2Beat optimistic rollup fraud proofs , comparing Arbitrum, Cartesi & Optimism
L2Beat optimistic rollup fraud proofs , comparing Arbitrum, Cartesi & Optimism
EIPs/Standards
• RIPs (Rollup improvement proposals): RIP7759 : Layer 2 transaction fees
RIPs (Rollup improvement proposals):
• RIP7759 : Layer 2 transaction fees
• ERCs (application layer standards): ERC7757 : Instinct-based automatic transactions ERC7758 : Transfer with authorization (ERC3009
update) ERC7760 : Minimal upgradeable proxies
ERCs (application layer standards):
• ERC7757 : Instinct-based automatic transactions
ERC7757 : Instinct-based automatic transactions
• ERC7758 : Transfer with authorization (ERC3009 update)
ERC7758 : Transfer with authorization (ERC3009 update)
• ERC7760 : Minimal upgradeable proxies
ERC7760 : Minimal upgradeable proxies
Stuff for developers
• Hardhat roadmap : OP Stack simulation & Solidity tests in v3, followed by portability via WASM, external EDR API, improved Solidity
debugging and simulation of more L2s
Hardhat roadmap : OP Stack simulation & Solidity tests in v3, followed by portability via WASM, external EDR API, improved Solidity
• Remix v0.53.0 : generate proofs in Circom compiler plugin
Remix v0.53.0 : generate proofs in Circom compiler plugin
• SOLX : transpile TypeScript to Solidity in Foundry tests & scripts
SOLX : transpile TypeScript to Solidity in Foundry tests & scripts
• web3.py v7 : redesigned WebSocketProvider & new AsyncIPCProvider with subscriptions, class based middleware, batch requests and more ABI
utility methods
web3.py v7 : redesigned WebSocketProvider & new AsyncIPCProvider with subscriptions, class based middleware, batch requests and more ABI
• Brontes : analytics pipeline to identify MEV, built on Reth
Brontes : analytics pipeline to identify MEV, built on Reth
• Noble-post-quantum (JavaScript): implements final FIPS 203/204/205 specs
Noble-post-quantum (JavaScript): implements final FIPS 203/204/205 specs
• CTFs: 5/9 Tardis : past Curta CTFs to play locally
CTFs:
• 5/9 Tardis : past Curta CTFs to play locally
• Scaffold-ETH 2 extensions hackathon , submit by September 2
Scaffold-ETH 2 extensions hackathon , submit by September 2
Security
• Whale $55M phishing attack , ownership of Maker vault changed
Ecosystem
• Vitalik: fundamentals are actually crazy strong right now
Vitalik: fundamentals are actually crazy strong right now
• Etherscan token standard checker : check if contract is ERC20/721/1155 compliant
Etherscan token standard checker : check if contract is ERC20/721/1155 compliant
• Ethereum Uruguay hackathon projects
Ethereum Uruguay hackathon projects
Enterprise
• Sony Block Solutions Labs (Sony joint venture) Soneium : planned OP Stack rollup
Sony Block Solutions Labs (Sony joint venture) Soneium : planned OP Stack rollup
• State Street partner with Taurus to provide digital asset products to institutional investors
State Street partner with Taurus to provide digital asset products to institutional investors
Job Listings
• Sablier are hiring a Business Development Lead and Frontend Engineer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
• Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 0.6 to 27.2 gwei, 1.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9 gwei 17k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
• Gas: 0.6 to 27.2 gwei, 1.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9 gwei
Gas: 0.6 to 27.2 gwei, 1.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9 gwei
• 17k ETH net issuance this week
17k ETH net issuance this week
• ETHUSD : $2,565 - $2,797, currently $2,767, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,565 - $2,797, currently $2,767, all time high $4,878
• ETHBTC : currently 0.043
ETHBTC : currently 0.043
Regulation/business/tokens
• US Treasury removed unhosted wallet rule
US Treasury removed unhosted wallet rule
• Coindesk: token theater , US employees claimed geoblocked airdrops
Coindesk: token theater , US employees claimed geoblocked airdrops
• Prometheum (Gensler favorite) plans to treat UNI & ARB as securities in custody service
Prometheum (Gensler favorite) plans to treat UNI & ARB as securities in custody service
General
• Vitalik: plurality philosophy
Vitalik: plurality philosophy

🎂 Eight year anniversary of Week in Ethereum News
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
